basics.name: zuo wang
basics.label: Software Development Engineer
basics.summary: Seeking full-time SDE or machine leanring engineer roles in US and EU.

highlights: Leading the development of a video-based stroke automatic detection platform to enable low-cost early screening.
Designed scalable distributed Flask + Gunicorn service on GCE achieving $0.0001 per request on 1 million requests.
Developed frontend and backend data visualization module in Python for NSF founded space telescope project.
Developed a spectrum accessing API to query PB amount of astronomical data from the clustered SQL server.

education.studyType: Bachelor Of Science with Honours-Second Class (Upper Division)

awards.title: The Mathematical Contest in Modeling-Honorable Mentions
awards.awarder: Consortium for Mathematics and Its Applications

publications.name: Enhanced isocitrate dehydrogenase mutation classification in lower grade gliomas with deep learning and CEST and MTC MRI

projects.name: Hyperopt-GBT
projects.description: An opensource general purpose stacking model framework
highlights: Developed a general purpose stacking framework around Sklearn API that support lightGBM and XGB library (open source).
The framework enables running tuning tasks concurrently on multi-GPU grid using MongoDB as asynchronous parallel communication hub.

projects.name: SyWorld
projects.description: A java desktop app combines your computers(cross-platform) into one cohesive experience with enhanced network transmission
highlights: Developed a cross-platform remote desktop that enables a user to control multiple terminals using one set of peripheral devices that runs on Windows, Linux, Mac OS simultaneously.
Optimized the TCP/IP protocol to create a LAN source-less P2P mutex protocol, reduced lagging 300 times.
Developed an SHA256 encrypted communication and certification module for grid communication.
Writing the test case for the project with Junit, code coverage 98%.

projects.name: Social network surveillance
projects.description: A real-time Twitter hashtag abuse monitoring and alerting system
highlights: Utilized Twitter real-time API to acquire high concurrent post and streaming with Kafka.
Created topic modelling for general public posts contains monitored hashtag using Amazon Comprehend,topic of suspect post was compared with general public to detect mismatch.
Deployed the server on Amazon EC2 with using Django.

projects.name: Automated Indicator Sharing
projects.description: A cyber intrusion detection system based on Department of Homeland Security's (DHS) free Automated Indicator Sharing project.
highlights: Implemented a LSTM model using tensorflow to achieve multi-classification on natural language reports, achieving 30% more on classification accuracy than keyword-based detection system.
Deployed model on Amazon Elastic Inference.

projects.name: Enhanced isocitrate dehydrogenase mutation classification
projects.description: A python-based computer vision platform for medical image processing and classification (publication).
highlights: Designed a 3D Medical Imagery processing toolkit using Python that makes it 30x faster than using 3D Slicer
Conducted deep learning research on MRI data using pytorch, improved 15% over state-of-art deep leaning publication, arriving at 0.80 AUC.
